p: More broadly, it is noteworthy that the redistributive elements of the EU policies (far from limited to the JTM) mostly do not find parallels in China’s ‘ecological civilization’ concept or in its practical implementation through green finance. At least as far as climate policy is concerned, there is evidently more focus on redistribution in the EU’s ‘social market economy’ (Treaty on European Union, Art. 3.3) than in ‘socialism with Chinese characteristics for a new era’.
